body:
Dear colleagues, 

please help to find the reason of next problem and fix the issue.

I want to model simple light shelve for 1 room. I specified an annual simulation mode.

The problem that with and without light shelve the DLA value is similar. Please help to find the reason.

[http://youtu.be/gq9vnTagYFw](http://youtu.be/gq9vnTagYFw)
